title: Hold The Phone
overview: Jenna Sativa is on the phone with a client. She's working from her office at home and is eager to get off the phone. While she explains the pros and cons of branding to her client, Maddy O'Reilly walks down to see her and she looks incredible. Wearing nothing but sexy pink lingerie, she walks up to Jenna and starts massaging her shoulders. Jenna is busy talking to the client but it's clear that Maddy just wants to have some fun. She starts running her hands-on Jenna's chest and squeezing her tits. Jenna looks at her and asks her to stop but Maddy is having way too much fun to do that. Maddy picks up a pen and starts running it on Jenna's skin as Jenna tries to push it away. She runs it down her chest and then starts running it up Jenna's leg. Jenna moans as she moves the phone away from her mouth telling Maddy how bad she's being. The client overhears her and Jenna has to correct herself as she asks Maddy to stop.
